document_data.name: Pantheon Temple of the Seldarine
document_data.mainbody: The '''Pantheon Temple of the Seldarine''' was a [[elf|elven]] [[temple]] dedicated to the [[Seldarine]] located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The building stood four stories tall.
document_data.Location: The Pantheon Temple of the Seldarine was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]] in a neighborhood that lay between [[Warrior's Way]] to the west and the [[Street of the Sword]] to the east.
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Biafyndar Loceath]] was an initiate of [[Corellon Larethian]] who worked within the temple.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: The only known surviving ruins of [[Aelinthaldaar]] could be found in the crypts beneath the temple.
